QuestData.Title: Gamel the Cruel
QuestData.Description: My own father was slain by the leader of this raiding party, Gamel the Cruel. He has made his abode inside a cave on the beach.$B$BYou've dealt with his men already. Finish what you've started, $n. Avenge my father and I will share with you what little I still have.
QuestData.LogDescription: Karuk wants you to defeat Gamel the Cruel at Riplash Strand.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it, $n! The spirits of the slain tuskarr can now rest in peace - their deaths have been avenged!
